text:
So just curious, has anyone developed a smoother way of querying HubDB by the "name" attribute of a select type field?
(Aside from a text to number conversion chart (ie. selectOption1 = 1) or full pull and condition filtering {% if loopItemName.name = target %} Do Stuff... )

So basically if hubdb_table_rows(tableID, "&selectItem.name=target") if it worked?
You can get column information about the table and look up the value by name
